abstract: Representatives provided free text-messaging services at parties organized by fans of Kris Allen after the final performance episode of “American Idol” last week.
snippet: Representatives provided free text-messaging services at parties organized by fans of Kris Allen after the final performance episode of “American Idol” last week.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  AT&T, one of the biggest corporate sponsors of “American Idol,” might have influenced the outcome of this year’s competition by providing phones for free text-messaging services and lessons in casting blocks of votes at parties organized by fans of Kris Allen, the Arkansas singer who was the winner of the show last week.

headline.print_headline: AT&T Workers in Arkansas Might Have Swayed the Results on ‘American Idol’

abstract: AT&T might have influenced the outcome of “American Idol” by providing phones for free text-messaging services and lessons in casting blocks of votes at parties organized by fans of Kris Allen.
snippet: AT&T might have influenced the outcome of “American Idol” by providing phones for free text-messaging services and lessons in casting blocks of votes at parties organized by fans of Kris Allen.
lead_paragraph: Edward Wyatt reports: AT&T, one of the biggest corporate sponsors of “American Idol,” may have influenced the outcome of this year’s competition by providing phones for free text-messaging services and lessons in casting blocks of votes at parties organized by fans of Kris Allen, the Arkansas singer who was the winner of the show last week.  Read more in Wednesday’s New York Times …

abstract: The companies said that free text-messaging services offered to fans of the eventual winner did not influence the outcome.
snippet: The companies said that free text-messaging services offered to fans of the eventual winner did not influence the outcome.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Fox Broadcasting and the companies that produce “American Idol” said Wednesday that they were “absolutely certain” that the outcome of voting for the winner was not unfairly influenced by free text-messaging services offered to fans of Kris Allen, the winner, at viewing parties in Arkansas last week.

headline.print_headline: Kris Allen Won Fairly, ‘Idol’ Producers Say
